TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Connector extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 表示工作流程設計介面上兩個活動設計工具之間的接點。

span.span: Represents a connector between two activity designers on a workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 接點就是出現在工作流程設計介面上，可將活動設計工具與其他設計工具連接在一起的線條。A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another. 提供了方法和屬性，可讓您自訂在設計階段中呈現活動設計工具時繪製一組接點的方式。 provides methods and properties that allow you to customize how to draw a set of connectors when an activity designer is rendered at design time.

span.span: Used for drawing the Connector when it is dragged from one state to another.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者建立接點、移動中心點或將端點從某一活動移動至其他活動時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when a user is creating a connector, moving a middle point or moving an endpoint from one activity to another.
